Package controller

Class Context

java.lang.Object
controller.Context
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
public class Context
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Serializable
Context is a wrapper around the entire app state. It keeps references to the internal states: IUserState, IEventState, and IBookingState. The state classes are kept as interfaces, so that other classes using the context cannot depend on their implementation details.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    Initialises all the state members with default constructors of the concrete implementations: UserState, EventState, and BookingState.

  • Constructor Details

    • Context

      public Context​(java.lang.String orgName, java.lang.String orgAddress, java.lang.String orgEmail, java.lang.String orgSecret)
      Initialises all the state members with default constructors of the concrete implementations: UserState, EventState, and BookingState.
      Parameters:
      orgName - Name of the organisation that owns this application instance
      orgAddress - Address of the organisation that owns this application instance
      orgEmail - Email address of the organisation, used for payment transactions
      orgSecret - Secret passcode only known to organisation staff, required for registering new Staff accounts

    • Context

      public Context​(Context other)
      Copy constructor, makes a deep copy of another Context.
      Parameters:
      other - context to copy
